price: 40. Ir iš tiesų, jam yra artimas priėjimas prie Mūsų, ir geras (paskutinis) sugrįžimas (Rojus).
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
